Name: Mezcal Negroni
Ingredients: 30 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (&/or skewered Fragata Green Olive ).
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish (&/or garnish with olive).
Review: This mezcal-influenced Negroni is an interesting take on the classic, which will be appreciated by mezcal aficionados.
History: Negroni cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Mezcal Negroni contains 180 calories
